page.title: 02MILLDEANS-A MIXED FARM 1
page.content: MILLDEANS FARM IS A SMALL FARM ON THE OUTSKIRTS OF LESLIE.IT IS 166 ACRES IN SIZE AND IS A MIXED ALTHOUGH MAINLY DAIRY.THERE ARE 76 DAIRY CATTLE,40-50 HEIFERS,13 CALVES,2 BULLS (LIMOUSIN AND FRESIAN) AND 5 HORSES (2 GELDINGS 2 BROOD MARE AND 1 FILLY). TWO FAMILIES (BOTH BROTHERS)LIVE ON THE FARM.THERE ARE TWO HABITABLE HOMES ,THE FARMHOUSE AND THE FARM COTTAGE. THE FARMHOUSE HAS 6 ROOMS WHEREAS THE COTTAGE ONLY HAS 4 ROOMS. ALTHOUGH MILLDEANS HAS A CROP ROTATION PLAN (PAGE 3) IT IS FLEXIBLE. TAKING ACCOUNT OF CHANGING PRICES, IF THE FARMERS THINK THAT TURNIP PRICES WILL RISE NEXT YEAR THEY MIGHT CUT OUT THE IDEA OF GRAIN IN FIELD 4 AND PLANT NEEPS(TURNIPS) INSTEAD.
